data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Xin, Deharveng, Louis, Wu, Donghui (2013): Broadening the definition of the genus Thalassaphorura Bagnall, 1949 (Collembola, Onychiuridae) with a new aberrant species from China. ZooKeys 364: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.364.6332, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.364.6332
